member.name: M:Intent.Modules.Common.CSharp.Templates.TemplateExtensions.ToCSharpIdentifier(System.String)
member.summary: An overload of where is set to .

member.name: M:Intent.Modules.Common.CSharp.Templates.TemplateExtensions.ToCSharpIdentifier(System.String,Intent.Modules.Common.CSharp.Templates.CapitalizationBehaviour)
member.summary: Converts to a valid C# identifier name.
member.remarks:
The following rules are applied to the in the following order:
If the string is null or whitespace, an empty string is returned.
Occurrences of '#' are replaced with 'Sharp`.
Occurrences of '&' are replaced with 'And`.
Any invalid characters are replaced with a ' ' (these spaces are removed in a subsequent step).
In the event there are multiple words, each except for the first has its first letter capitalized and are then joined together.
is applied to first character.
If the first character is a number, then an '_' prefix is applied.
If the identifier is a C# keyword, then an '@' prefix is applied.
member.param: The value to change into a C# identifier.
